title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.6 - Resident employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.6 - Resident employees

State Regulations

An authority may assign apartments for resident
employees and their families if such assignment will provide for more efficient
operation of the project. The apartments to be assigned and the rents to be
charged shall be established by the authority, subject to prior written
approval of the division. Resident employees shall not be subject to rental
surcharges. The resident employees apartment lease, which provides for vacating
the apartment upon termination of employment, shall be executed for all
resident employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-7.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
